name: Acoustic Guitar
details: Acoustic guitars are a great choice for beginners and experienced players alike. They're versatile and can be used for a variety of genres, including folk, country, and blues. This acoustic guitar from D'Addario is made with a solid spruce top and mahogany back and sides. It has a comfortable dreadnought body style and comes with a hardshell case.

name: Electric Guitar
details: Electric guitars are a popular choice for rock, blues, and metal players. They offer a wide range of sounds and can be used for a variety of genres. This electric guitar from Fender is made with a solid alder body and maple neck. It has a comfortable Stratocaster body style and comes with a hardshell case.

name: Bass Guitar
details: Bass guitars are a key part of any rock, pop, or jazz band. They provide the low-end foundation for the music and can be used to create a variety of sounds. This bass guitar from Ibanez is made with a solid mahogany body and maple neck. It has a comfortable Jazz Bass body style and comes with a gig bag.

name: Drum Set
details: Drum sets are a great way to make music. They can be used for a variety of genres, including rock, pop, and jazz. This drum set from Ludwig is made with a maple shell and comes with a variety of cymbals and hardware.

name: Acoustic Guitar
details: A versatile string instrument used in various genres.

name: Electric Guitar
details: A guitar with a solid body and electronic pickups.

name: Violin
details: A bowed string instrument with a four-string setup.

name: Piano
details: A versatile keyboard instrument with 88 keys.
